content: This coin has huge potential!#TumpCoin, @TrumpCoinDTC, $DTCContract: ¬†0xAb8c98491816FEde394582f7758A5eFfeb4368d7Below is a note from the developer...WHY YOU SHOULD HOLD TRUMPCOINIn a few months from now Trump will be trending EVERYWHERE!!
